content: Great introduction to the platform! I think we should add more specific examples of how teams can get started.
Good point! I'll add a quick start guide section in the next revision.
The key features list is excellent. Should we include pricing information or keep it separate?
This is exactly what our audience needs. The best practices are spot-on based on our user research.
Consider adding a case study or real-world example for each practice. It would make the content more actionable.
Excellent suggestion! I have a great case study from TechCorp that would fit perfectly with practice #3.
The team structure section needs more detail. Can we expand on the roles and responsibilities?
Also, we should include some metrics on what makes a team high-performing. Data always helps with credibility.
This draft has great potential! The introduction really hooks the reader. Consider adding some templates or examples.
The ROI angle is perfect for our audience. We should include some specific ROI calculations or benchmarks.
Agreed! I'll add a section with industry benchmarks and a simple ROI calculator framework.
Fantastic piece on remote collaboration! The insights about asynchronous work are particularly valuable.
